Speaker: Narrator
Lines: Welcome to the wonderful world of Pages!

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: I'm assuming you've never played before since I just made it.
So let's go over how it works.

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: This is a Multi Turn-Based game, meaning each round you and your opponent will plan out multiple turns worth of action.

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: Once everyone has thier turns ready, the round will start and all characters will act out thier planned turns.

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: Down at the bottom of the screen are your Pages and your PageQue.

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: Each one represents an action you can preform durring combat.

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: It holds the Pages you have queued up for the next round.

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: You can add Pages to your PageQue by simply clicking on them.
Or remove them by clicking thier icon in the PageQue.

Speaker: Narrator
Lines: When the round begins, your character will act out each Page in the order they were added to the PageQue.
